title: Help meeee
body: So, I just finished a game, and when I clicked Play Again, it reconnected me to the last game I finished and now I cant play any more games. When I log in again, it just tries to reconnect me and tells me to check my connection. I cant get out from the screen that says reconnect, please heeeeeeeeeelp.

replies.body: Yea this sounds like yet another ghost game unfortunately. The last game you were in never reported the end of game to your client, which is why your client keeps trying to put you back into a game that doesn't exist. These ghost games clear up after enough time though, have you been able to get back in a game yet?
Lots of people having the same problem. I've been waiting for 2 hours. Riot said that it could take up to 3 hours to fix.
